title: Gekiai No Yobigoe Ga Dekiai No Kyougoe Wo

reports.summary: Removed the extra string (which was the right thing to do, as it's not used even once in the song), but while doing so, added unnecessary complications to the tab, making it harder to read.

This version of tabulation is just nonsesical and ridiculous. The unnecessary and dumb jumps from 6 to 4, even to 3 string, this bullshit doesn't even match the official cover from the band member (reference: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7KhSf72hxT4). It's uncomfortable to play with downstroke too, which was also used by official band members during their tours and composing. And that I demand to revert to older version without all this crap.

title: Gekiai No Yobigoe Ga Dekiai No Kyougoe Wo
